Bremed BD 7300 massager is a therapeutic massager that provides an ideal solution to your health problems and adds value to your beauty regime. This Bremed BD 7300 is a versatile massager that comes with an assortment of massages used for body sculpting cellulite reduction and treatment for healthy looking skin.

The massager has been specially designed to provide a vacuum therapy that provides a solution to any problems related to cellulite localized adiposity skin and drooping muscles without inflicting pain on any parts of your body. This vacuum massager is a painless technique that reduces and beats body imperfections.

Build

The Bremed BD 7300 massager is compact and lightweight making it very portable. You can carry this massager with you even if you are travelling. Donning an innovative and ergonomic built this massager delivers professional massage with a comfortable operation. This massager comes with 3 suction cups of different sizes. The small cup measures 30 mm and is used for the area around your face and neck. With the 65 mm medium cup you can massage your arms legs abdomen and hip. Lastly the large cup that measures 95 mm in diameter massages the surface of your breasts.

Equipped with slide buttons and a release push button this BD 7300 massager by Bremed is very simple and easy to use. You can use one of the slide buttons to activate the 4 micro controlled suction pace programs that is integrated in this massager. The selection of these suction programs are determined by evaluating the area to be treated and the size of the cup you are using.

You can choose your preferred program depending on the area you want to massage and the intensity of the suction you desire. If the suction is too strong and causes discomfort you can quickly stop the massage by pressing the Release button thus making the massager safe and easy to handle.

Performance

Developed to perform an intense and effective massage this Bremed BD 7300 massager carries out a deep massage based on cutaneous suction or vacuum therapy. This deep massage generates the mobilization of fats present in your skin cells thereby activating the process of lipolysis resulting in reduction of solid fats.

Vacuum is created in the cup which is capable of stimulating the natural cutaneous receptors. The vacuum-filled cup generates the suction massaging the area of treatment. Operating at a suction of 50 kPa the cup causes a powerful action on the muscles and adipose tissues thereby promoting and improving your blood circulation and lymphatic drainage resulting in healthier muscle tone. This vacuum massager's core principle is based on the acupuncture theory in which human body is divided in reflex zones. As the massager operates based on the acupuncture theory it is capable of stimulating these reflex zones providing relief from common ailments.

Likewise the massage delivered by Bremed BD 7300 massager also increases blood flow thus capable of supplying more oxygen and other nutrients to the treatment areas. This leads to exfoliation of dead cells that result in healthy and glowing skin. The massager also functions to develop the shape and size of your breasts.

With the BD 7300 Bremed massager you can also massage your atrophied muscles leaving you relaxed and rejuvenated. Additionally this massager also increases the circulation of lymphocyte hence increasing the count of your white blood cells which in turn strengthens your immune system. The Bremed BD 7300 massager operates on a 500 mA rechargeable battery. This massager requires 8-12 hours of charging time from an electrical supply of 110-240 V.

Monitoring your blood pressure using the Bremed BD 8000 Upper arm BP monitor is very useful and convenient as this BP monitor provides accurate and reliable readings within the comfort of your home. This BP monitor is featured with an Irregular Heartbeat Indicator which automatically detects abnormal heartbeats and alerts you by flashing a heart symbol on the display screen. The automatic upper arm BP monitor also comes with a low battery indicator apprising you when the battery is low.

With the switching 4 color LED indicator in the Bremed BD 8000 BP monitor different colors such as green blue purple and red indicate your blood pressure status according to the WHO hypertension guidelines. The Green is indicative of normal pressure the blue indicates pre-hypertension while the purple alerts you of hypertension in the first stage. Lastly the red indicates you have hypertension that needs medical attention. This function allows you to get a clear understanding of your blood pressure status.

Build

The Bremed BD 8000 BP monitor is ergonomically designed to provide you a comfortable and easy measuring process. This Bremed automatic BP monitor incorporates two components comprising of the main unit and a non-integrated arm cuff. The main unit is equipped with a large easy-to-read LCD screen that displays both systolic/diastolic pressure readings and pulse rates simultaneously. In addition to this the main unit also houses one touch operation buttons that makes it easy and simple to use the monitor.

This automatic upper arm Bremed BP monitor provides an easy-to-attach cuff that is capable of naturally conforming to the contours of your arms. All you need to do is attach the cuff to our arms and press the control buttons to start your measuring process.

Performance and Features

The Bremed BD 8000 BP Monitor employs the Oscillometric method to determine your blood pressure readings. Built to provide high performance resulting in reliable and genuine results this digital BP monitor features an advanced Fuzzy Logic technology. The Fuzzy logic technology automatically detects the approximate systolic value by which the BP monitor inflates to an optimal level leading to automatic inflation and deflation.

Facilitated with a memory feature that accommodates 4 users to save 99 sets of readings each this BP monitor is capable of storing a total of 396 readings updated with date and time. With this function you can track your BP readings over a period of time.

Furthermore the BD 8000 Bremed BP monitor also features a 5 mode average function that automatically calculates the average of your BP readings for consistent reading values. The BP monitor is capable of taking the average of your BP readings in 5 modes on an hourly daily weekly monthly and an overall basis. This BP monitor is also vested with an automatic power off system that automatically shuts down the device when not in use.

The Bremed BD 8000 is capable of displaying readings ranging from 0-280 mmHg for pressure and 40-195 beats/min for pulse rates. The accuracy of this BP monitor is calibrated at +/-3 mmHg for pressure readings and +/-5 % of reading for pulse progress. This Bremed BD 8000 operates on 4 AA batteries. The Bremed BD 5200 Nebulizer is an ultra-sonic inhaler and an ideal device for the treatment of all respiratory and lung related conditions. This nebulizer uses its ultra-sonic power to break down the curative solution into small aerosol droplets that can be breathed directly from the mouthpiece.

The ultra-sonic nebulizer is designed with a separate motor speed and nebulization flow speed which enhances the performance of the device. Simple and compact this nebulizer from Bremed allows the precise dosage of medicine to reach your lungs.

Body

The Bremed BD 5200 Nebulizer can be used by both adults and children since the device consists of an adult mask as well as the pediatric mask. Along with the masks the main unit also comprises of an angled mouth piece a medicinal cup and a set of five spare replaceable filters.

Weighing 210 g the Bremed BD 5200 Nebulizer can be carried along while you are on the move. In addition to this the device also comes with a smart nylon pouch making it all the more easier for you to carry. The medication cup which is connected to the mouthpiece is capable of holding 4 ml of the medicinal solution helping you breathe with ease. The Bremed BD 5200 Nebulizer has dimensions of 12.9 cm x 6.9 cm x 5.2 cm.

Performance and Features

This nebulizer from Bremed delivers adequate amount of medication to your lungs at an average nebulization rate 1 ml per minute. The ultra-sonic nebulizer produces a particle size of 0.5 to 4 μm hence making it possible for the tiny particles to travel through the narrow branches of your lower airways.

The Bremed BD 5200 Nebulizer operates swiftly at a temperature ranging from 10 to 40 degree Celsius and humidity ranging from 30 to 85% RH. You can store the nebulizer at a temperature ranging from 20 to 60 degree Celsius with a humidity ranging from 10 to 95% RH. This nebulizer machine uses electricity with a power supply of 100 - 240V 50-60 Hz. The device consumes only 16 W of power supply and also comes with an option of operating on batteries ( to be bought separately) . These batteries could be recharged with the adaptor that comes along with this nebulizer.

You could expect therapeutic relief with the Bremed BD 5007 Nebulizer as this device can aid you in treating your respiratory conditions with ease and efficacy. The Bremed compressor nebulizer uses compressed air or oxygen to transform the liquid medication solution to vapor-like particles or aerosol. The medication in aerosol form can be easily inhaled by you through a mouthpiece or face mask.

For respiratory treatment inhalation of medication in aerosol form is more effective than the regular ingestion of medicine as it directly reaches your lungs leading to a quicker treatment time. The compressor unit incorporates an in-built piston pump that allows the nebulizer machine to operate with a noise level of 48 Dba which is comparatively low as compared to other conventional nebulizers.

Body

The Bremed BD 5007 Nebulizer just weighs about 420 g making the device extremely compact and portable. You have the freedom to carry the device with you even if you are on the go. The Bremed nebulizer consists of four main components that include the compressor unit air tube nebulization or medication cup and a mouthpiece which can be replaced by face masks.

The compressor unit is small and sleek. This unit houses a simple on/off control button and an air tube that connects the main unit to the nebulization cup and mouthpiece. The nebulization cup is capable of holding 6 ml of your prescribed medication. The mouthpiece is comfortable and allows you to inhale the medication with your natural breathing pattern. This nebulizer machine also comes with adult and pediatric mask hence making the device ideal for all ages.

Performance and Features

This Bremed compressor nebulizer machine operates at an average nebulization rate of 0.4 ml per min allowing the device to deliver high concentration of medication in aerosol form. This compressor unit supplies oxygen at a high velocity providing oxygen at an airflow rate of 8.0 l per min. As the oxygen flows through the medication solution it flows at an airflow rate of 6.5 l per min therefore efficiently turning the medication to aerosol.

The Mass Median Aerodynamic Diameter (MMAD) is 2.44 microns. The MMAD is the average of the distribution of aerosol mass with respect to aerodynamic diameter. Powered by electricity the BD 5007 nebulizer consumes 20 W of electricity from a power supply of 100-240 V 50/60 Hz.

Bremed BD 5004 Nebulizer Price: Rs.4200

Key Features

  • 2.5 MHz Frequency
  • 0.5 to 4 micro m Particle Size
  • Ultrasonic Nebulizer
  • Low Sound Level
  • 8 ml Medication Capacity
  • Ultrasound Method Motor

If comfort and convenience is your priority then the Bremed BD 5004 Nebulizer is an ideal choice for all your respiratory and lung related issues.  This compact device uses Ultra Sonic Waves to convert the liquid medicine into fine mist-like elements or aerosols.

The functioning of this nebulizer is simple and effortless. An electronic fluctuation included in this device generates an ultrasonic wave frequency of 2.5 MHz that causes the vibration of a piezoelectric element. This element in turn comes in contact with the nebulizer cup changing your medication to aerosols which facilitates easy inhalation.


Body

The Bremed BD 5004 Nebulizer is equipped with an adult mask as well as a paediatric mask enabling both children and adults to make use of this device. The medication cup mouthpiece and the tube connectors are combined with the main unit. This nebulizer from Bremed weighs 425 g making it easy for you to carry it along when you are travelling. The device also has dimensions of 14 cm x 16.4 cm x 9.7 cm.

Unlike air compressors which are heavy in nature the ultrasonic nebulizer produces aerosols from ultrasonic vibrations providing easy handling. Besides this advantage the Bremed BD 5004 Nebulizer also functions with the least amount of noise thus giving you a pleasant operating experience.

The user friendly nebulizer is capable of holding 8 ml of the medicinal solution in the medication cup thereby enabling sufficient dosage of the required medicine to reach your lungs. The mouthpiece of this nebulizer permits easy inhalation of the medication. 


Performance and Features

The Bremed BD 5004 Nebulizer works with an average nebulization rate of 1ml per min and the aerosol or particle sizes ranging from 0.5 to 4 µm. These particle sizes are minute enough to enter into the slender portions of your respiratory tracts leading to a speedy and effective usage.

This device operates at a temperature ranging from 20 to 60 degree Celsius and humidity ranging from 30 to 85% RH. Storing this nebulizer would require a temperature range of 20 to 60 degree Celsius with humidity ranging from 10 to 95% RH. This Bremed BD 5004 Nebulizer operates by directly plugging it into a power source and with rechargeable batteries. This device runs on a power supply of 230V 50 Hz.
